Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that holds immense significance and worth to both of us. This product, which I believe is worth $1,000,000 to you, has been meticulously crafted to meet your highest standards and expectations. I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. I trust this proposal aligns well with your financial planning and investment goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this exceptional product into your possession. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
